George Osodi bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto si Ogwashi Ukwu, Delta Steeti.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Yaba College of Technology na Lagos n'agbata afọ 1996 na 1999
Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Comet site na 1999 ruo 2002
Ọ gara n'ihu na Associated Press site na 2002 ruo 2008
O nwetara diplọma ọkachamara na ịme ihe nkiri site na London Academy of Media, Film and TV n'afọ 2009.
Ọrụ ya pụtara na Bloomberg, Time, The Guardian, The New York Times, akwụkwọ akụkọ Telegraph, USA Today, CNN, na BBC Focus on Africa magazine. Ọ bụ onye otu Panos Pictures UK
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museumslandschaft Hessen Kassel na Germany; Neue Galerie na New York City, US, na Newark Museum of Art.
Osodi nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na-edekọ mmetụta nke mmịpụta mmanụ na Niger Delta.
Osodi ritere ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi Fuji African Photojournalist of the Year n'afọ 2004 na ngalaba Features and Portfolio.
